channel.title: 5starxx(delta) development team
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][b]We Start at NOW![/b][/size]
[center]Base(s): [hr] DELTA [/center]
[font=Trebuchet Ms][center][size=5][u][b][/b][/u][/size]
[ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#about]About us[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#aim]Section 3[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#donation]Section 4[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#applying]The Applying Layout[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#staff]Staff list[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#credit]Credit/Section 7[/iurl][/li][/ul]
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] I want to start this so new people will develop better coding skills(myself) and so pros will have the chance so work as a team
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=about]2.0 - About us[/b][/size] OUR GROUP WILL BE NAMED 5STARXX(DELTA) WE want a GOOD RSPS THAT LISTENS TO THeiR COMMUNITY. AND MAKE DELTA REALLY STABLE
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=aim]3.0 - Reason[/b][/size] To make delta at its best. Also make a healthy community
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=donation]4.0 - Section 4 [/b][/size] ALL OUR DONATIONS will go to the server. Equipment Dropbox and Teamviewer
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=appliying]5.0 - The Applying Layout[/b][/size]
Here is the layout:
(Suggested Layout)
[code] In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address?: What position do you want? (Coder, Suggester, Tester): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any proof of work? [/code] [ul][center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=staff]6.0 - Staff List[/b][/size]
Coders:
[b]1/7[/b]
ME Dwarfs Person 3 Person 4 Person 5 Person 6 Person 7
Suggestors:
[b]0/2[/b]
Person 1 Person 2
Testers:
[b]1/50[/b]
ME Web Developers: [b]1/5[/b]
client developers: [b]1/3[/b]
Hosters: [b]1/2[/b] None
ADD ME ON SKYPE(OWNER_GHOST) BTW IN A RUSH
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center][/ul]

item.title: 5starxx(delta) development team
item.dc:creator: @zlLux zlLux
item.description:
@zlLux wrote:

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: zlLux
How old are you?:15
E-mail address?:Ill PM
What position do you want? (Coder, Suggester, Tester):Suggester/Hoster Codeing after I learn it.
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?:NONE
What time zone are you in?:Central
How long will you be on everyday?:about 5 hours weekdays less weekends.
Why do you want to become part of this server?: Good Community and rs friends.
Any proof of work? I can show you my old hosting files.

Read full topic

item.title: 5starxx(delta) development team
item.dc:creator: @the_king_erik the king erik
item.description:
@the_king_erik wrote:

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: ingame: erik forums: erik
How old are you?:14
E-mail address?:e_nemeth@gmx.at
What position do you want? (Coder, Suggester, Tester): Coder
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: I started coding 4 years ago(i know i was 10 when i started learning java.)
What time zone are you in?:UTC/GMT +2 hours
How long will you be on everyday?:24/7 Forever alone + no-lifer
Why do you want to become part of this server?:i was coder for much other projects but they all failed. hope this one wont fail
Any proof of work?indeed. proof #1http://rrelicteddx.createaforum.com/ relicted-x (maybe u remember it as ritzscape. we just swaped source.) proof#2 (this one is nooby.)http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U6UxKX4PclI

i would be happy if i can code for this server.

Read full topic

item.title: 5starxx(delta) development team
item.dc:creator: @Vudu_Codex Vudu Codex
item.description:
@Vudu_Codex wrote:

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: Odd Won
How old are you?: 15
E-mail address?: vuducodex@gmail.com
What position do you want? (Coder, Suggester, Tester): coder
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: 4-5 Months
What time zone are you in?: CST
How long will you be on everyday?: All Day; No-Lifer.
Why do you want to become part of this server?: I’m looking to develop a server with more than just myself. It gets boring alone.
Any proof of work? Nope. I’ve been working on my friends server, but he deleted it because he wanted to play 06 scape, so sadly my work is gone…

Read full topic

item.description:
@jummppy wrote:

im just trying to see how many i can get i want at most 5 for coders atmost 2web dev atmost 2 hosters a lot of beta testers

item.title: 5starxx(delta) development team
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs dwarfs
item.description:
@dwarfs wrote:

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: My ingame name is Dwarf
How old are you?: 16
E-mail address?: I’ll send to you via Skype
What position do you want? (Coder, Suggester, Tester): Coder
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: I coded with Java for 2years now.
What time zone are you in?: Standard time zone: UTC/GMT +1 hour/Daylight saving time: +1 hour
How long will you be on everyday?: I got vacation now and can code 4-5 hours a day.
Why do you want to become part of this server?: All the Delta sources I see are to basic or full of customs. I hope this server will change that.
Any proof of work? When I tried to release my work (DwarfScape) my computer crashed.
I worked on that server for weeks.
Than the shop (where i brought my PC to) told me the only thing they could do was reset him.
I’d like to start over again with a development team.

Dwarfs

Read full topic

pics would be nice

item.title: 5starxx(delta) development team
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

5 web developers will never work together.

Also, I have a development team full of people who are really, really good with java and I’ve only managed to get 5 of them, so I doubt you’ll get a further 6 developers who are skilled. You may wish to lower your numbers.

Read full topic
